article_title: 'Shower Shirt' Takes Innovation Prize, Enables Women To Shower After Mastectomy

article_metadata.author: Elaine Schattner

og.description: The Shower Shirt is made of waterproof parachute material on the outside, with microfiber on the inside of the neck, a water-resistant zipper, flap, and Velcro all the way down in front. The openings for the neck and arms are elastic,
